LJCWriter.summary: Contains console and file output methods.
LJCWriter.remarks:
The Write() and WriteLine() static functions are used to write to stdout.

The FWrite() and FWriteLine() methods that write to the file stream passed to the LJCWriter constructor.

Write.param: The number of tabs to add to the line beginning.
Adds an HTML break before the cr/lf.
Write.remarks:
The text is sent to stdout using the echo php function.

It is often used for Debug output.

WriteAll.param: Indicates if each line ends with a newline.

WriteLine.summary: Writes a text line with indents.
WriteLine.param: The number of tabs to add to the line beginning.
Adds an HTML break before the cr/lf.
WriteLine.remarks:
The text is sent to stdout using the echo php function.

It is often used for Debug output.

FWrite.param: The number of tabs to add to the line beginning.

FWriteLine.summary: Writes a file text line with indents.
FWriteLine.param: The number of tabs to add to the line beginning.
